meta.title: Time Shooter 3: SWAT - Epic FPS Action Game
meta.description: Experience intense slow-motion gunfights in Time Shooter 3: SWAT. Dodge attacks and use time as your ultimate weapon.

hero.title: Welcome to Time Shooter 3: SWAT
hero.subTitle: Master the art of time manipulation in epic FPS battles.

features.title: Key Features
features.subTitle: Discover the exciting elements of the game.

items.title: Dynamic Time Control
items.description: Your movements influence time, allowing for strategic gameplay and thrilling encounters.

items.title: Variety of Weapons
items.description: Choose from an array of weapons to take down enemies effectively and stylishly.

items.title: Engaging 3D Environment
items.description: Immerse yourself in beautifully crafted levels designed for intense FPS action.

items.title: Epic Slow-Motion Gunfights
items.description: Experience breathtaking gunfights that slow down time for precision attacks.

howToPlay.title: How to Play?
howToPlay.subTitle: Essential tips for dominating the battlefield.

items.text: Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate and control your character's movements.
Engage enemies by left-clicking to shoot or pick up weapons.
Utilize riot shields for added defense during firefights.
Plan your weapon strategy based on the situation to maximize effectiveness.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subTitle: Common questions about Time Shooter 3: SWAT.

items.question: How many levels are in Time Shooter 3: SWAT?
items.answer: The game features endless levels for continuous gameplay.

items.question: What is the best way to play Time Shooter 3: SWAT?
items.answer: For the best experience, play on a desktop PC.

items.question: Can I play this game on mobile?
items.answer: Yes, the game is optimized for both desktop and mobile browsers.

items.question: Is Time Shooter 3: SWAT free to play?
items.answer: Yes, you can enjoy the game for free on your web browser.
